longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: 
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Poland will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Extension possible (for max. 90 days) for visa exempt
  visitors. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P. vivax,
  exists throughout the year below 1500m, with a varying
  degree of risk. Recommended prevention in risk areas: B.
